programme.title: What the American People Want
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke reflects on the opinion poll discoveries of George H Gallup.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke examines the relationship between politicians and public opinion, as well as the life and polling discoveries of George H Gallup.

programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
